full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Summary
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's (AAFC) Lethbridge Research and Development Centre is inviting bids for the supply and delivery of an Agricultural Tractor. The deadline for submission of required documents and bids has been updated as indicated below.

### Tender Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Number** | WS3660418113 |
| **Reference Number** | WS3660418113 - Doc3666547394 |
| **Tender Name** | Agricultural Tractor Acquisition |
| **Tender Category** | Goods and Services |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Proposal |
| **Supply Category** | Tractors (25101901) |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive (Open Bidding) |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement |
| **Regions of Delivery** | Lethbridge, Alberta |
| **Estimated Contract Start Date** | 2022-11-15 |
| **Estimated Contract End Date** | 2023-03-31 |

### Tender Status
The tender is currently expired with an updated closing time of November 22nd, 2022 at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. 

### Contract Requirements
Agricultural and Agri-Food Canada is seeking the supply and delivery of an Agricultural Tractor to be used for pulling a plot sprayer. The scope of the contract is detailed in Annex B, Basis of Payment, with mandatory technical specifications outlined in Annex C, Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.

### Contact Information
Zumbado Diaz, Willy (SPAC/PSPC)
willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Lethbridge Research and Development Centre
960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, ON, K1Y 4X2

Please find the full notice at:
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14347420?extsite=MTQzNDc0MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
